page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT 1
page.content: {Unemployment}in the Newton Abbot area does not seem to be a great problem with the unemployment rate about average. Most people work for{small {firms}and many have to travel outside the area to larger communities. Most people work for{service industries rather than heavy manufacturing companies. During the summer months there are more opportunities for jobs because of the{tourists}that come in to the area and make for jobs in hotels, holiday camps etc. When a firm closes it does cause a great shock, but most people seem to find other jobs fairly quickly. One problem people were concerned about was the fact that many{young people}had to move away to find a suitable job.
